title: Order

MarkCare.description: The name, expressed as text, of a person or organization at this address into whose care incoming mail is entrusted; corresponds to the printed forms "care of" and "c/o".

CountrySubentityCode.description: The political or administrative division of a country in which this address is located, such as a county, province, or state, expressed as a code (typically nationally agreed).

Region.title: Address. Region. Text

District.title: Address. District. Text

ReleaseID.description: An identifier used for approval of access to delivery locations (e.g., port terminals).

TrackingID.title: Delivery. Tracking Identifier. Identifier
TrackingID.description: The delivery Tracking ID (for transport tracking).

CarrierParty.title: Delivery. Carrier_ Party. Party
CarrierParty.description: The party responsible for delivering the goods.

DeliveryParty.title: Delivery. Delivery_ Party. Party
DeliveryParty.description: The party to whom the goods are delivered.

NotifyParty.title: Delivery. Notify_ Party. Party
NotifyParty.description: A party to be notified of this delivery.

Despatch.title: Delivery. Despatch
Despatch.description: The despatch (pickup) associated with this delivery.

ID.title: Despatch. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this despatch event.

RequestedDespatchDate.title: Despatch. Requested_ Despatch Date. Date
RequestedDespatchDate.description: The despatch (pickup) date requested, normally by the buyer.

RequestedDespatchTime.title: Despatch. Requested_ Despatch Time. Time
RequestedDespatchTime.description: The despatch (pickup) time requested, normally by the buyer.

GuaranteedDespatchDate.title: Despatch. Guaranteed_ Despatch Date. Date
GuaranteedDespatchDate.description: The date guaranteed for the despatch (pickup).

GuaranteedDespatchTime.title: Despatch. Guaranteed_ Despatch Time. Time
GuaranteedDespatchTime.description: The time guaranteed for the despatch (pickup).

ReleaseID.title: Despatch. Release. Identifier
ReleaseID.description: An identifier for the release of the despatch used as security control or cargo control (pick-up).

Instructions.title: Despatch. Instructions. Text
Instructions.description: Text describing any special instructions applying to the despatch (pickup).

NotifyParty.title: Despatch. Notify_ Party. Party
NotifyParty.description: A party to be notified of this despatch (pickup).

Contact.title: Despatch. Contact
Contact.description: The primary contact for this despatch (pickup).

EstimatedDespatchPeriod.title: Despatch. Estimated Despatch_ Period. Period
EstimatedDespatchPeriod.description: The period estimated for the despatch (pickup) of goods.

RequestedDespatchPeriod.title: Despatch. Requested Despatch_ Period. Period
RequestedDespatchPeriod.description: The period requested for the despatch (pickup) of goods.

DeliveryTerms.title: Delivery. Delivery Terms
DeliveryTerms.description: Terms and conditions relating to the delivery.

ID.title: Delivery Terms. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this description of delivery terms.

SpecialTerms.title: Delivery Terms. Special_ Terms. Text
SpecialTerms.description: A description of any terms or conditions relating to the delivery items.

LossRiskResponsibilityCode.title: Delivery Terms. Loss Risk Responsibility Code. Code
LossRiskResponsibilityCode.description: A code that identifies one of various responsibilities for loss risk in the execution of the delivery.

LossRisk.title: Delivery Terms. Loss Risk. Text
LossRisk.description: A description of responsibility for risk of loss in execution of the delivery, expressed as text.

Amount.title: Delivery Terms. Amount
Amount.description: The monetary amount covered by these delivery terms.

DeliveryLocation.title: Delivery Terms. Delivery_ Location. Location
DeliveryLocation.description: The location for the contracted delivery.

AllowanceCharge.title: Delivery Terms. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: An allowance or charge covered by these delivery terms.

ID.title: Allowance Charge. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this allowance or charge.

ChargeIndicator.title: Allowance Charge. Charge_ Indicator. Indicator
ChargeIndicator.description: An indicator that this AllowanceCharge describes a charge (true) or a discount (false).

AllowanceChargeReasonCode.title: Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge Reason Code. Code
AllowanceChargeReasonCode.description: A mutually agreed code signifying the reason for this allowance or charge.

AllowanceChargeReason.title: Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge_ Reason. Text
AllowanceChargeReason.description: The reason for this allowance or charge.

MultiplierFactorNumeric.title: Allowance Charge. Multiplier_ Factor. Numeric
MultiplierFactorNumeric.description: A number by which the base amount is multiplied to calculate the actual amount of this allowance or charge.

PrepaidIndicator.title: Allowance Charge. Prepaid_ Indicator. Indicator
PrepaidIndicator.description: An indicator that this allowance or charge is prepaid (true) or not (false).

SequenceNumeric.title: Allowance Charge. Sequence. Numeric
SequenceNumeric.description: A number indicating the order of this allowance or charge in the sequence of calculations applied when there are multiple allowances or charges.

Amount.title: Allowance Charge. Amount
Amount.description: The monetary amount of this allowance or charge to be applied.

BaseAmount.title: Allowance Charge. Base_ Amount. Amount
BaseAmount.description: The monetary amount to which the multiplier factor is applied in calculating the amount of this allowance or charge.

AccountingCostCode.title: Allowance Charge. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: The accounting cost centre used by the buyer to account for this allowance or charge, expressed as a code.

AccountingCost.title: Allowance Charge. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: The accounting cost centre used by the buyer to account for this allowance or charge, expressed as text.

PerUnitAmount.title: Allowance Charge. Per Unit_ Amount. Amount
PerUnitAmount.description: The allowance or charge per item; the total allowance or charge is calculated by multiplying the per unit amount by the quantity of items, either at the level of the individual transaction line or for the total number of items in the document, depending on the context in which it appears.

TaxCategory.title: Allowance Charge. Tax Category
TaxCategory.description: A tax category applicable to this allowance or charge.

ID.title: Tax Category. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this tax category.

Name.title: Tax Category. Name
Name.description: The name of this tax category.

Percent.title: Tax Category. Percent
Percent.description: The tax rate for this category, expressed as a percentage.

BaseUnitMeasure.title: Tax Category. Base Unit Measure. Measure
BaseUnitMeasure.description: A Unit of Measures used as the basic for the tax calculation applied at a certain rate per unit.

PerUnitAmount.title: Tax Category. Per Unit_ Amount. Amount
PerUnitAmount.description: Where a tax is applied at a certain rate per unit, the rate per unit applied.

TaxExemptionReasonCode.title: Tax Category. Tax Exemption Reason Code. Code
TaxExemptionReasonCode.description: The reason for tax being exempted, expressed as a code.

TaxExemptionReason.title: Tax Category. Tax Exemption Reason. Text
TaxExemptionReason.description: The reason for tax being exempted, expressed as text.

TierRange.title: Tax Category. Tier Range. Text
TierRange.description: Where a tax is tiered, the range of taxable amounts that determines the rate of tax applicable to this tax category.

TierRatePercent.title: Tax Category. Tier Rate. Percent
TierRatePercent.description: Where a tax is tiered, the tax rate that applies within the specified range of taxable amounts for this tax category.

TaxScheme.title: Tax Category. Tax Scheme
TaxScheme.description: The taxation scheme within which this tax category is defined.

TaxTotal.title: Allowance Charge. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total of all the taxes applicable to this allowance or charge.

TaxAmount.title: Tax Total. Tax Amount. Amount
TaxAmount.description: The total tax amount for a particular taxation scheme, e.g., VAT; the sum of the tax subtotals for each tax category within the taxation scheme.

RoundingAmount.title: Tax Total. Rounding Amount. Amount
RoundingAmount.description: The rounding amount (positive or negative) added to the calculated tax total to produce the rounded TaxAmount.

TaxEvidenceIndicator.title: Tax Total. Tax Evidence_ Indicator. Indicator
TaxEvidenceIndicator.description: An indicator that this total is recognized as legal evidence for taxation purposes (true) or not (false).

TaxIncludedIndicator.title: Tax Total. Tax Included_ Indicator. Indicator
TaxIncludedIndicator.description: An indicator that tax is included in the calculation (true) or not (false).

TaxSubtotal.title: Tax Total. Tax Subtotal
TaxSubtotal.description: One of the subtotals the sum of which equals the total tax amount for a particular taxation scheme.

TaxableAmount.title: Tax Subtotal. Taxable_ Amount. Amount
TaxableAmount.description: The net amount to which the tax percent (rate) is applied to calculate the tax amount.

TaxAmount.title: Tax Subtotal. Tax Amount. Amount
TaxAmount.description: The amount of this tax subtotal.

CalculationSequenceNumeric.title: Tax Subtotal. Calculation Sequence. Numeric
CalculationSequenceNumeric.description: The number of this tax subtotal in the sequence of subtotals corresponding to the order in which multiple taxes are applied. If all taxes are applied to the same taxable amount (i.e., their order of application is inconsequential), then CalculationSequenceNumeric is 1 for all tax subtotals applied to a given amount.

TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount.title: Tax Subtotal. Transaction Currency_ Tax Amount. Amount
TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The amount of this tax subtotal, expressed in the currency used for invoicing.

Percent.title: Tax Subtotal. Percent
Percent.description: The tax rate of the tax category applied to this tax subtotal, expressed as a percentage.

BaseUnitMeasure.title: Tax Subtotal. Base Unit Measure. Measure
BaseUnitMeasure.description: The unit of measure on which the tax calculation is based

PerUnitAmount.title: Tax Subtotal. Per Unit_ Amount. Amount
PerUnitAmount.description: Where a tax is applied at a certain rate per unit, the rate per unit applied.

TierRange.title: Tax Subtotal. Tier Range. Text
TierRange.description: Where a tax is tiered, the range of taxable amounts that determines the rate of tax applicable to this tax subtotal.

TierRatePercent.title: Tax Subtotal. Tier Rate. Percent
TierRatePercent.description: Where a tax is tiered, the tax rate that applies within a specified range of taxable amounts for this tax subtotal.

TaxCategory.title: Tax Subtotal. Tax Category
TaxCategory.description: The tax category applicable to this subtotal.

PaymentMeans.title: Allowance Charge. Payment Means
PaymentMeans.description: A means of payment for this allowance or charge.

ID.title: Payment Means. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this means of payment.

PaymentMeansCode.title: Payment Means. Payment Means Code. Code
PaymentMeansCode.description: A code signifying the type of this means of payment.

PaymentDueDate.title: Payment Means. Payment Due Date. Date
PaymentDueDate.description: The date on which payment is due for this means of payment.

PaymentChannelCode.title: Payment Means. Payment Channel Code. Code
PaymentChannelCode.description: A code signifying the payment channel for this means of payment.

InstructionID.title: Payment Means. Instruction Identifier. Identifier
InstructionID.description: An identifier for the payment instruction.

InstructionNote.title: Payment Means. Instruction_ Note. Text
InstructionNote.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

PaymentID.title: Payment Means. Payment Identifier. Identifier
PaymentID.description: An identifier for a payment made using this means of payment.

CardAccount.title: Payment Means. Card Account
CardAccount.description: A credit card, debit card, or charge card account that constitutes this means of payment.

PrimaryAccountNumberID.title: Card Account. Primary_ Account Number. Identifier
PrimaryAccountNumberID.description: An identifier of the card (e.g., the Primary Account Number (PAN)).

NetworkID.title: Card Account. Network. Identifier
NetworkID.description: An identifier for the financial service network provider of the card.

CardTypeCode.title: Card Account. Card Type Code. Code
CardTypeCode.description: A mutually agreed code signifying the type of card. Examples of types are "debit", "credit" and "purchasing"

ValidityStartDate.title: Card Account. Validity Start Date. Date
ValidityStartDate.description: The date from which the card is valid.

ExpiryDate.title: Card Account. Expiry Date. Date
ExpiryDate.description: The date on which the card expires.

IssuerID.title: Card Account. Issuer. Identifier
IssuerID.description: An identifier for the institution issuing the card.

IssueNumberID.title: Card Account. Issue Number. Identifier
IssueNumberID.description: An identifier for the card, specified by the issuer.

CV2ID.title: Card Account. CV2. Identifier
CV2ID.description: An identifier for the Card Verification Value (often found on the reverse of the card itself).

CardChipCode.title: Card Account. Card Chip Code. Code
CardChipCode.description: A mutually agreed code to distinguish between CHIP and MAG STRIPE cards.

ChipApplicationID.title: Card Account. Chip_ Application. Identifier
ChipApplicationID.description: An identifier on the chip card for the application that provides the quoted information; an AID (application ID).

PayerFinancialAccount.title: Payment Means. Payer_ Financial Account. Financial Account

PayeeFinancialAccount.title: Payment Means. Payee_ Financial Account. Financial Account

CreditAccount.title: Payment Means. Credit Account
CreditAccount.description: A credit account associated with this means of payment.

AccountID.title: Credit Account. Account Identifier. Identifier
AccountID.description: An identifier for this credit account.

PaymentMandate.title: Payment Means. Payment Mandate
PaymentMandate.description: The payment mandate associated with this means of payment.

ID.title: Payment Mandate. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this payment mandate.

MandateTypeCode.title: Payment Mandate. Mandate Type Code. Code
MandateTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of this payment mandate.

MaximumPaymentInstructionsNumeric.title: Payment Mandate. Maximum Payment Instructions. Numeric
MaximumPaymentInstructionsNumeric.description: The number of maximum payment instructions allowed within the validity period.

MaximumPaidAmount.title: Payment Mandate. Maximum_ Paid Amount. Amount
MaximumPaidAmount.description: The maximum amount to be paid within a single instruction.

SignatureID.title: Payment Mandate. Signature Identifier. Identifier
SignatureID.description: An identifier for a signature applied by a signatory party.

PayerParty.title: Payment Mandate. Payer_ Party. Party
PayerParty.description: The payer party (if different from the debtor).

PayerFinancialAccount.title: Payment Mandate. Payer_ Financial Account. Financial Account

ValidityPeriod.title: Payment Mandate. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: The period during which this mandate is valid.

PaymentReversalPeriod.title: Payment Mandate. Payment Reversal_ Period. Period
PaymentReversalPeriod.description: The period of the reverse payment.

Clause.title: Payment Mandate. Clause
Clause.description: A clause applicable to this payment mandate.

TradeFinancing.title: Payment Means. Trade Financing
TradeFinancing.description: A trade finance agreement applicable to this means of payment.

ID.title: Trade Financing. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this trade financing instrument.

FinancingInstrumentCode.title: Trade Financing. Financing Instrument Code. Code
FinancingInstrumentCode.description: A code signifying the type of this financing instrument.

ContractDocumentReference.title: Trade Financing. Contract_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ContractDocumentReference.description: A reference to a contract document.

DocumentReference.title: Trade Financing. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to a document associated with this trade financing instrument.

FinancingParty.title: Trade Financing. Financing_ Party. Party
FinancingParty.description: The financing party (bank or other enabled party).

FinancingFinancialAccount.title: Trade Financing. Financing_ Financial Account. Financial Account
FinancingFinancialAccount.description: An internal bank account used by the bank or its first agent to manage the line of credit granted to the financing requester.

Clause.title: Trade Financing. Clause
Clause.description: A clause applicable to this trade financing instrument.

MinimumDeliveryUnit.title: Delivery. Minimum_ Delivery Unit. Delivery Unit
MinimumDeliveryUnit.description: The minimum delivery unit for this delivery.

BatchQuantity.title: Delivery Unit. Batch Quantity. Quantity
BatchQuantity.description: The quantity of ordered Items that constitutes a batch for delivery purposes.

ConsumerUnitQuantity.title: Delivery Unit. Consumer_ Unit. Quantity
ConsumerUnitQuantity.description: The quantity of units in the Delivery Unit expressed in the units used by the consumer.

HazardousRiskIndicator.title: Delivery Unit. Hazardous Risk_ Indicator. Indicator
HazardousRiskIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods are subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

MaximumDeliveryUnit.title: Delivery. Maximum_ Delivery Unit. Delivery Unit
MaximumDeliveryUnit.description: The maximum delivery unit for this delivery.

ID.title: Shipment. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this shipment.

ShippingPriorityLevelCode.title: Shipment. Shipping Priority Level Code. Code
ShippingPriorityLevelCode.description: A code signifying the priority or level of service required for this shipment.

HandlingCode.title: Shipment. Handling Code. Code
HandlingCode.description: The handling required for this shipment, expressed as a code.

HandlingInstructions.title: Shipment. Handling_ Instructions. Text
HandlingInstructions.description: The handling required for this shipment, expressed as text.

Information.title: Shipment. Information. Text
Information.description: Free-form text pertinent to this shipment, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

GrossWeightMeasure.description: The total gross weight of a shipment; the weight of the goods plus packaging plus transport equipment.

NetNetWeightMeasure.title: Shipment. Net Net_ Weight. Measure
NetNetWeightMeasure.description: The total net weight of this shipment, excluding packaging and transport equipment.

GrossVolumeMeasure.title: Shipment. Gross_ Volume. Measure
GrossVolumeMeasure.description: The total volume of the goods in this shipment, including packaging.

NetVolumeMeasure.title: Shipment. Net_ Volume. Measure
NetVolumeMeasure.description: The total volume of the goods in this shipment, excluding packaging and transport equipment.

TotalGoodsItemQuantity.title: Shipment. Total_ Goods Item Quantity. Quantity
TotalGoodsItemQuantity.description: The total number of goods items in this shipment.

TotalTransportHandlingUnitQuantity.description: The number of pieces of transport handling equipment (pallets, boxes, cases, etc.) in this shipment.

InsuranceValueAmount.description: The amount covered by insurance for this shipment.

DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.description: The value of this shipment, declared by the shipper or his agent solely for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage, in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.title: Shipment. Declared Statistics_ Value. Amount
DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.description: The value, declared for statistical purposes, of those goods in this shipment that have the same statistical heading.

FreeOnBoardValueAmount.title: Shipment. Free On Board_ Value. Amount
FreeOnBoardValueAmount.description: The monetary amount that has to be or has been paid as calculated under the applicable trade delivery.

SpecialInstructions.title: Shipment. Special_ Instructions. Text
SpecialInstructions.description: Special instructions relating to this shipment.

DeliveryInstructions.title: Shipment. Delivery_ Instructions. Text
DeliveryInstructions.description: Delivery instructions relating to this shipment.

SplitConsignmentIndicator.title: Shipment. Split Consignment_ Indicator. Indicator
SplitConsignmentIndicator.description: An indicator that the consignment has been split in transit (true) or not (false).

ConsignmentQuantity.title: Shipment. Consignment_ Quantity. Quantity
ConsignmentQuantity.description: The total number of consignments within this shipment.

ID.title: Consignment. Identifier

CarrierAssignedID.title: Consignment. Carrier Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
CarrierAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the carrier.

ConsigneeAssignedID.title: Consignment. Consignee Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
ConsigneeAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the consignee.

ConsignorAssignedID.title: Consignment. Consignor Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
ConsignorAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the consignor.

FreightForwarderAssignedID.title: Consignment. Freight Forwarder Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
FreightForwarderAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the freight forwarder.

BrokerAssignedID.title: Consignment. Broker Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
BrokerAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the broker.

ContractedCarrierAssignedID.title: Consignment. Contracted Carrier Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
ContractedCarrierAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the contracted carrier.

PerformingCarrierAssignedID.title: Consignment. Performing Carrier Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
PerformingCarrierAssignedID.description: An identifier for this consignment, assigned by the performing carrier.

SummaryDescription.title: Consignment. Summary_ Description. Text
SummaryDescription.description: A textual summary description of the consignment.

TotalInvoiceAmount.title: Consignment. Total_ Invoice Amount. Amount
TotalInvoiceAmount.description: The total of all invoice amounts declared in this consignment.

DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.title: Consignment. Declared Customs_ Value. Amount
DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.description: The total declared value for customs purposes of all the goods in this consignment, regardless of whether they are subject to the same customs procedure, tariff/statistical categorization, country information, or duty regime.

TariffDescription.title: Consignment. Tariff Description. Text

TariffCode.title: Consignment. Tariff Code. Code
TariffCode.description: A code signifying the tariff applied to this consignment.

GrossWeightMeasure.title: Consignment. Gross_ Weight. Measure
GrossWeightMeasure.description: The total declared weight of the goods in this consignment, including packaging but excluding the carrier's equipment.

NetWeightMeasure.title: Consignment. Net_ Weight. Measure
NetWeightMeasure.description: The total net weight of all the goods items referred to as one consignment.

NetNetWeightMeasure.title: Consignment. Net Net_ Weight. Measure
NetNetWeightMeasure.description: The total net weight of the goods in this consignment, exclusive of packaging.

ChargeableWeightMeasure.title: Consignment. Chargeable_ Weight. Measure
ChargeableWeightMeasure.description: The weight upon which a charge is to be based.

GrossVolumeMeasure.title: Consignment. Gross_ Volume. Measure
GrossVolumeMeasure.description: The total volume of the goods referred to as one consignment.

NetVolumeMeasure.title: Consignment. Net_ Volume. Measure
NetVolumeMeasure.description: The total net volume of all goods items referred to as one consignment.

LoadingLengthMeasure.title: Consignment. Loading_ Length. Measure
LoadingLengthMeasure.description: The total length in a means of transport or a piece of transport equipment which, given the width and height of the transport means, will accommodate all of the consignments in a single consolidation.

Remarks.title: Consignment. Remarks. Text
Remarks.description: Remarks concerning the complete consignment, to be printed on the transport document.

HazardousRiskIndicator.title: Consignment. Hazardous Risk_ Indicator. Indicator
HazardousRiskIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

AnimalFoodIndicator.title: Consignment. Animal_ Food Indicator. Indicator
AnimalFoodIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are animal foodstuffs (true) or not (false).

HumanFoodIndicator.title: Consignment. Human_ Food Indicator. Indicator
HumanFoodIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are for human consumption (true) or not (false).

LivestockIndicator.title: Consignment. Livestock_ Indicator. Indicator
LivestockIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods are livestock (true) or not (false).

BulkCargoIndicator.title: Consignment. Bulk Cargo_ Indicator. Indicator
BulkCargoIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are bulk cargoes (true) or not (false).

ContainerizedIndicator.title: Consignment. Containerized_ Indicator. Indicator
ContainerizedIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are containerized cargoes (true) or not (false).

GeneralCargoIndicator.title: Consignment. General Cargo_ Indicator. Indicator
GeneralCargoIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment are general cargoes (true) or not (false).

SpecialSecurityIndicator.title: Consignment. Special_ Security Indicator. Indicator
SpecialSecurityIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods in this consignment require special security (true) or not (false).

ThirdPartyPayerIndicator.title: Consignment. Third Party Payer_ Indicator. Indicator
ThirdPartyPayerIndicator.description: An indication that this consignment will be paid for by a third party (true) or not (false).

CarrierServiceInstructions.description: Service instructions to the carrier, expressed as text.

CustomsClearanceServiceInstructions.title: Consignment. Customs Clearance Service_ Instructions. Text
CustomsClearanceServiceInstructions.description: Service instructions for customs clearance, expressed as text.

ForwarderServiceInstructions.title: Consignment. Forwarder Service_ Instructions. Text
ForwarderServiceInstructions.description: Service instructions for the forwarder, expressed as text.

SpecialServiceInstructions.title: Consignment. Special Service_ Instructions. Text
SpecialServiceInstructions.description: Special service instructions, expressed as text.

SequenceID.title: Consignment. Sequence Identifier. Identifier
SequenceID.description: A sequence identifier for this consignment.

ShippingPriorityLevelCode.title: Consignment. Shipping Priority Level Code. Code
ShippingPriorityLevelCode.description: A code signifying the priority or level of service required for this consignment.

HandlingCode.title: Consignment. Handling Code. Code
HandlingCode.description: The handling required for this consignment, expressed as a code.

HandlingInstructions.title: Consignment. Handling_ Instructions. Text
HandlingInstructions.description: The handling required for this consignment, expressed as text.

Information.title: Consignment. Information. Text
Information.description: Free-form text pertinent to this consignment, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

TotalGoodsItemQuantity.title: Consignment. Total_ Goods Item Quantity. Quantity
TotalGoodsItemQuantity.description: The total number of goods items in this consignment.

TotalTransportHandlingUnitQuantity.title: Consignment. Total_ Transport Handling Unit Quantity. Quantity
TotalTransportHandlingUnitQuantity.description: The number of pieces of transport handling equipment (pallets, boxes, cases, etc.) in this consignment.

InsuranceValueAmount.title: Consignment. Insurance_ Value. Amount
InsuranceValueAmount.description: The amount covered by insurance for this consignment.

DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.title: Consignment. Declared For Carriage_ Value. Amount
DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.description: The value of this consignment, declared by the shipper or his agent solely for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage, in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.title: Consignment. Declared Statistics_ Value. Amount
DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.description: The value, declared for statistical purposes, of those goods in this consignment that have the same statistical heading.

FreeOnBoardValueAmount.title: Consignment. Free On Board_ Value. Amount
FreeOnBoardValueAmount.description: The monetary amount that has to be or has been paid as calculated under the applicable trade delivery.

SpecialInstructions.title: Consignment. Special_ Instructions. Text
SpecialInstructions.description: Special instructions relating to this consignment.

SplitConsignmentIndicator.title: Consignment. Split Consignment_ Indicator. Indicator
SplitConsignmentIndicator.description: An indicator that this consignment has been split in transit (true) or not (false).

DeliveryInstructions.title: Consignment. Delivery_ Instructions. Text
DeliveryInstructions.description: A set of delivery instructions relating to this consignment.

ConsignmentQuantity.title: Consignment. Consignment_ Quantity. Quantity
ConsignmentQuantity.description: The count in this consignment considering goods items, child consignments, shipments

ConsolidatableIndicator.title: Consignment. Consolidatable_ Indicator. Indicator
ConsolidatableIndicator.description: An indicator that this consignment can be consolidated (true) or not (false).

HaulageInstructions.title: Consignment. Haulage_ Instructions. Text
HaulageInstructions.description: Instructions regarding haulage of this consignment, expressed as text.

LoadingSequenceID.title: Consignment. Loading_ Sequence Identifier. Identifier
LoadingSequenceID.description: An identifier for the loading sequence of this consignment.

TotalPackagesQuantity.title: Consignment. Total_ Packages Quantity. Quantity
TotalPackagesQuantity.description: The total number of packages associated with a Consignment.

ConsolidatedShipment.description: A consolidated shipment (a shipment created by an act of consolidation).

CustomsDeclaration.description: A class describing identifiers or references relating to customs procedures.

RequestedPickupTransportEvent.description: The pickup of this consignment requested by the party requesting a transportation service (the transport user).

RequestedDeliveryTransportEvent.description: The delivery of this consignment requested by the party requesting a transportation service (the transport user).

PlannedPickupTransportEvent.description: The pickup of this consignment planned by the party responsible for providing the transportation service (the transport service provider).

PlannedDeliveryTransportEvent.title: Consignment. Planned Delivery_ Transport Event. Transport Event
PlannedDeliveryTransportEvent.description: The delivery of this consignment planned by the party responsible for providing the transportation service (the transport service provider).

ChildConsignment.description: One of the child consignments of which a consolidated consignment is composed.

ConsigneeParty.title: Consignment. Consignee_ Party. Party
ConsigneeParty.description: A party to which goods are consigned.

ExporterParty.title: Consignment. Exporter_ Party. Party
ExporterParty.description: The party that makes the export declaration, or on behalf of which the export declaration is made, and that is the owner of the goods in this consignment or has similar right of disposal over them at the time when the declaration is accepted.

ConsignorParty.title: Consignment. Consignor_ Party. Party
ConsignorParty.description: The party consigning goods, as stipulated in the transport contract by the party ordering transport.

ImporterParty.title: Consignment. Importer_ Party. Party
ImporterParty.description: The party that makes an import declaration regarding this consignment, or on behalf of which a customs clearing agent or other authorized person makes an import declaration regarding this consignment. This may include a person who has possession of the goods or to whom the goods are consigned.

CarrierParty.title: Consignment. Carrier_ Party. Party
CarrierParty.description: The party providing the transport of goods in this consignment between named points.

FreightForwarderParty.description: The party combining individual smaller consignments into a single larger shipment (the consolidated shipment), which is sent to a counterpart that mirrors the consolidator's activity by dividing the consolidated consignment into its original components.

NotifyParty.title: Consignment. Notify_ Party. Party
NotifyParty.description: The party to be notified upon arrival of goods and when special occurrences (usually pre-defined) take place during a transportation service.

OriginalDespatchParty.title: Consignment. Original Despatch_ Party. Party
OriginalDespatchParty.description: The original despatch (sender) party for this consignment.

FinalDeliveryParty.title: Consignment. Final Delivery_ Party. Party
FinalDeliveryParty.description: The final delivery party for this consignment.

PerformingCarrierParty.title: Consignment. Performing Carrier_ Party. Party

SubstituteCarrierParty.description: A substitute party performing the carriage of this consignment.

LogisticsOperatorParty.description: The logistics operator party for this consignment.

TransportAdvisorParty.title: Consignment. Transport Advisor_ Party. Party
TransportAdvisorParty.description: The party providing transport advice this consignment.

HazardousItemNotificationParty.title: Consignment. Hazardous Item Notification_ Party. Party

PaymentTerms.description: The terms of payment between the parties (such as logistics service client, logistics service provider) in a transaction.

In addition to transport costs, this may include such elements as packing, documentation, loading, unloading, and insurance to the extent that they relate to the freight costs.

LastExitPortLocation.title: Consignment. Last Exit Port_ Location. Location

For example, if this service is a carrier service scheduled for Wednesday 16 February 2011 at 10 a.m. CET, the nomination date might be Tuesday15 February 2011.

NominationTime.description: In a transportation contract, the deadline time by which the services referred to in the transport execution plan have to be booked. For example, if this service is a carrier service scheduled for Wednesday 16 February 2011 at 10 a.m. CET, the nomination date might be Tuesday15 February 2011 and the nomination time 4 p.m. at the latest.

FlashpointTemperature.title: Hazardous Item. Flashpoint_ Temperature. Temperature
FlashpointTemperature.description: The flashpoint temperature of this hazardous item; i.e., the lowest temperature at which vapors above a volatile combustible substance ignite in air when exposed to flame.

AdditionalTemperature.title: Hazardous Item. Additional_ Temperature. Temperature
AdditionalTemperature.description: Another temperature relevant to the handling of this hazardous item.

ClassifiedTaxCategory.title: Item. Classified_ Tax Category. Tax Category
ClassifiedTaxCategory.description: A tax category applicable to this item.

AdditionalItemProperty.title: Item. Additional_ Item Property. Item Property
AdditionalItemProperty.description: An additional property of this item.

ID.title: Item Property. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this property of an item.

Name.title: Item Property. Name
Name.description: The name of this item property.

NameCode.title: Item Property. Name Code. Code
NameCode.description: The name of this item property, expressed as a code.

TestMethod.title: Item Property. Test Method. Text
TestMethod.description: The method of testing the value of this item property.

Value.title: Item Property. Value. Text
Value.description: The value of this item property, expressed as text.

ValueQuantity.title: Item Property. Value_ Quantity. Quantity
ValueQuantity.description: The value of this item property, expressed as a quantity.

ValueQualifier.title: Item Property. Value Qualifier. Text
ValueQualifier.description: Text qualifying the value of the property.

ImportanceCode.title: Item Property. Importance Code. Code
ImportanceCode.description: A code signifying the importance of this property in using it to describe a related Item.

ListValue.title: Item Property. List Value. Text
ListValue.description: The value expressed as a text in case the property is a value in a list. For example, a colour.

UsabilityPeriod.title: Item Property. Usability_ Period. Period
UsabilityPeriod.description: The period during which this item property is valid.

ItemPropertyGroup.title: Item Property. Item Property Group
ItemPropertyGroup.description: A description of the property group to which this item property belongs.

ID.title: Item Property Group. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this group of item properties.

Name.title: Item Property Group. Name
Name.description: The name of this item property group.

ImportanceCode.title: Item Property Group. Importance Code. Code
ImportanceCode.description: A code signifying the importance of this property group in using it to describe a required Item.

RangeDimension.title: Item Property. Range_ Dimension. Dimension
RangeDimension.description: The range of values for the dimensions of this property.

ItemPropertyRange.title: Item Property. Item Property Range
ItemPropertyRange.description: A range of values for this item property.

MinimumValue.title: Item Property Range. Minimum_ Value. Text
MinimumValue.description: The minimum value in this range of values.

MaximumValue.title: Item Property Range. Maximum_ Value. Text
MaximumValue.description: The maximum value in this range of values.

InformationContentProviderParty.title: Item. Information Content Provider_ Party. Party
InformationContentProviderParty.description: The party responsible for specification of this item.

OriginAddress.title: Item. Origin_ Address. Address
OriginAddress.description: A region (not country) of origin of this item.

ItemInstance.title: Item. Item Instance
ItemInstance.description: A trackable, unique instantiation of this item.

ProductTraceID.title: Item Instance. Product Trace_ Identifier. Identifier
ProductTraceID.description: An identifier used for tracing this item instance, such as the EPC number used in RFID.

ManufactureDate.title: Item Instance. Manufacture Date. Date
ManufactureDate.description: The date on which this item instance was manufactured.

ManufactureTime.title: Item Instance. Manufacture Time. Time
ManufactureTime.description: The time at which this item instance was manufactured.

BestBeforeDate.title: Item Instance. Best Before Date. Date
BestBeforeDate.description: The date before which it is best to use this item instance.

RegistrationID.title: Item Instance. Registration Identifier. Identifier
RegistrationID.description: The registration identifier of this item instance.

SerialID.title: Item Instance. Serial Identifier. Identifier
SerialID.description: The serial number of this item instance.

AdditionalItemProperty.title: Item Instance. Additional_ Item Property. Item Property
AdditionalItemProperty.description: An additional property of this item instance.

LotIdentification.title: Item Instance. Lot Identification
LotIdentification.description: The lot identifier of this item instance (the identifier that allows recall of the item if necessary).

ExpiryDate.title: Lot Identification. Expiry Date. Date
ExpiryDate.description: The expiry date of the lot.

AdditionalItemProperty.title: Lot Identification. Additional_ Item Property. Item Property
AdditionalItemProperty.description: An additional property of the lot.

Certificate.title: Item. Certificate
Certificate.description: A certificate associated with this item.

ID.title: Certificate. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this certificate.

CertificateTypeCode.title: Certificate. Certificate Type Code. Code
CertificateTypeCode.description: The type of this certificate, expressed as a code. The type specifies what array it belongs to, e.g.. Environmental, security, health improvement etc.

CertificateType.title: Certificate. Certificate Type. Text
CertificateType.description: The type of this certificate, expressed as a code. The type specifies what array it belongs to, e.g.. Environmental, security, health improvement etc.

Remarks.title: Certificate. Remarks. Text
Remarks.description: Remarks by the applicant for this certificate.

IssuerParty.title: Certificate. Issuer_ Party. Party
IssuerParty.description: The authorized organization that issued this certificate, the provider of the certificate.

DocumentReference.title: Certificate. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to a document relevant to this certificate or an application for this certificate.

Signature.title: Certificate. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this certificate.

ID.title: Signature. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this signature.

Note.title: Signature. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures; in particular, information regarding the circumstances in which the signature is being used.

ValidationDate.title: Signature. Validation Date. Date
ValidationDate.description: The date upon which this signature was verified.

ValidationTime.title: Signature. Validation Time. Time
ValidationTime.description: The time at which this signature was verified.

ValidatorID.title: Signature. Validator. Identifier
ValidatorID.description: An identifier for the organization, person, service, or server that verified this signature.

CanonicalizationMethod.title: Signature. Canonicalization Method. Text
CanonicalizationMethod.description: The method used to perform XML canonicalization of this signature.

SignatureMethod.title: Signature. Signature Method. Text
SignatureMethod.description: Text describing the method of signature.

DigitalSignatureAttachment.title: Signature. Digital Signature_ Attachment. Attachment
DigitalSignatureAttachment.description: The actual encoded signature (e.g., in XMLDsig format).

OriginalDocumentReference.title: Signature. Original_ Document Reference. Document Reference
OriginalDocumentReference.description: A reference to the document that the signature applies to. For evidentiary purposes, this may be the document image that the signatory party saw when applying their signature.

Dimension.title: Item. Dimension
Dimension.description: One of the measurable dimensions (length, mass, weight, or volume) of this item.

SubLineItem.title: Line Item. Sub_ Line Item. Line Item
SubLineItem.description: The subsidiary line items that constitute the main line item, such as in a bill of materials.

WarrantyValidityPeriod.title: Line Item. Warranty Validity_ Period. Period
WarrantyValidityPeriod.description: The period during which the warranty associated with this line item is valid.

WarrantyParty.title: Line Item. Warranty_ Party. Party
WarrantyParty.description: The party responsible for any warranty associated with this line item.

TaxTotal.title: Line Item. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: A total amount of taxes of a particular kind applicable to this item.

ItemPriceExtension.title: Line Item. Item_ Price Extension. Price Extension
ItemPriceExtension.description: The price extension, calculated by multiplying the price per unit by the quantity of items.

Amount.title: Price Extension. Amount
Amount.description: The amount of this price extension.

TaxTotal.title: Price Extension. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: A total amount of taxes of a particular kind applicable to this price extension.

LineReference.title: Line Item. Line Reference
LineReference.description: A reference to a line in a document associated with this line item.

LineID.title: Line Reference. Line Identifier. Identifier
LineID.description: Identifies the referenced line in the document.

UUID.title: Line Reference. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for this line reference.

LineStatusCode.title: Line Reference. Line Status Code. Code
LineStatusCode.description: A code signifying the status of the referenced line with respect to its original state.

DocumentReference.title: Line Reference. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to the document containing the referenced line.

SellerProposedSubstituteLineItem.title: Order Line. Seller Proposed Substitute_ Line Item. Line Item
SellerProposedSubstituteLineItem.description: In Order Response, a line item proposed by the seller describing a product that might substitute for the product described in this order line.

SellerSubstitutedLineItem.title: Order Line. Seller Substituted_ Line Item. Line Item
SellerSubstitutedLineItem.description: In Order Response, a line item that has replaced the original order line item. The specified quantity and pricing may differ from those in the original line item, but when a line item is substituted by the seller, it is assumed that other information, such as shipment details, will remain the same.

BuyerProposedSubstituteLineItem.title: Order Line. Buyer Proposed Substitute_ Line Item. Line Item
BuyerProposedSubstituteLineItem.description: A description of an item proposed by the buyer as a possible alternative to the item associated with this order line.

CatalogueLineReference.title: Order Line. Catalogue_ Line Reference. Line Reference
CatalogueLineReference.description: A reference to a catalogue line associated with this order line.

QuotationLineReference.title: Order Line. Quotation_ Line Reference. Line Reference
QuotationLineReference.description: A reference to a quotation line associated with this order line.

OrderLineReference.title: Order Line. Order Line Reference
OrderLineReference.description: A reference to another order line, such as in a replacement order or another line on the same order that is related.

LineID.title: Order Line Reference. Line Identifier. Identifier
LineID.description: An identifier for the referenced order line, assigned by the buyer.

SalesOrderLineID.title: Order Line Reference. Sales Order_ Line Identifier. Identifier
SalesOrderLineID.description: An identifier for the referenced order line, assigned by the seller.

UUID.title: Order Line Reference. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for this order line reference.

LineStatusCode.title: Order Line Reference. Line Status Code. Code
LineStatusCode.description: A code signifying the status of the referenced order line with respect to its original state.

OrderReference.title: Order Line Reference. Order Reference
OrderReference.description: A reference to the Order containing the referenced order line.

ID.title: Order Reference. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this order reference, assigned by the buyer.

SalesOrderID.title: Order Reference. Sales_ Order Identifier. Identifier
SalesOrderID.description: An identifier for this order reference, assigned by the seller.

CopyIndicator.title: Order Reference. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether the referenced Order is a copy (true) or the original (false).

UUID.title: Order Reference. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for this order reference.

IssueDate.title: Order Reference. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date on which the referenced Order was issued.

IssueTime.title: Order Reference. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time at which the referenced Order was issued.

CustomerReference.title: Order Reference. Customer_ Reference. Text
CustomerReference.description: Text used for tagging purchasing card transactions.

OrderTypeCode.title: Order Reference. Order Type Code. Code
OrderTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of the referenced Order.

DocumentReference.title: Order Reference. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A document associated with this reference to an Order.

DocumentReference.title: Order Line. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to a document associated with this order line.
